title: Ep. 37 "WTF Is C.O. Talking About?"
description:
Disclaimer: All comments made by C.O. were of a questionably sound but sober mind because he doesn't indulge in the cocktails.

Welcome back an old guest C.O. who in the time since his first appearance on the show last fall, has been in 3 relationships and is now a relationship expert. Who would have thought?

You'll want to hear this.

Follow our guest C.O. @the.co.show and look out for his new podcast's debut!!

Follow us at

@cocktalespodcast

@coffeebeandean
